de.fhpotsdam.simpletouch

Class TouchObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhpotsdam.simpletouch.TransformableObject
      • de.fhpotsdam.simpletouch.TouchObject

  • public abstract class TouchObject
extends TransformableObject
    Object can be transformed by fingers / TuioCursors. Enables dragging
